item.title: Workflow
item.description: We commit in branches and open pull requests on the default branch (main|master). New Code Commit to your new branch Open a PR Get some reviews Merge into default branch Merge it, Merge it flowchart LR; [CODE]--[REMOTE BRANCH]; [REMOTE BRANCH]--[PULL REQUEST]; [PULL REQUEST]--[REVIEW]; [REVIEW]--[MERGE]; [MERGE]--[DEPLOY];
